text: Nampikkaiyalarkale! (Vetakkararkalin) patirikalilum, (cilai vanankikalin) canniyacikalilum palar makkalin celvankalait tappana muraiyil vilunki varuvatutan allahvutaiya pataiyil (makkal) celvataiyum tatai ceykinranar. Akave, (ivarkalukkum innum evarkal) tankattaiyum, velliyaiyum cekarittu vaittukkontu, atai allahvutaiya pataiyil celavu ceyyatirukkinranaro avarkalukkum (napiye!) Nir tunpuruttum vetanaiyai narceytiyakak kuruviraka
